definitions.text: come into the possession of something concrete or abstract
examples: She got a lot of paintings from her uncle
They acquired a new pet
Get your results the next day
Get permission to take a few days off from work

definitions.text: take on a certain form, attribute, or aspect
examples: His voice took on a sad tone
The story took a new turn
he adopted an air of superiority
She assumed strange manners
The gods assume human or animal form in these fables

definitions.text: come to have or undergo a change of (physical features and attributes)
examples: He grew a beard
The patient developed abdominal pains
I got funny spots all over my body
Well-developed breasts

definitions.text: locate (a moving entity) by means of a tracking system such as radar

examples: I acquired a passing knowledge of Chinese
Gain an understanding of international finance
She learned dancing from her sister
I learned Sanskrit
Children acquire language at an amazing rate
I acquired a strong aversion to television
Children must develop a sense of right and wrong
Dave developed leadership qualities in his new position
develop a passion for painting
